cause.description:
The KICK Project is a nonprofit organization that collects new soccer balls and money donations that are then sent with groups traveling to poor areas of the world who then delever the soccer balls to needy children.
1. Every child deserves the right to play soccer
2. Soccer is a universal love among the world's youth
cause.mission: distribute soccer balls to kids around the world to kids who otherwise do not have them.
cause.name: The KICK Project
